attributes.action: Raise the Profile and Funding of Pancreatic Cancer
attributes.additional_details: This cancer is the forgotten cancer. It is being mis- diagnosed or ignored by the NHS in so many cases, and when it is finally diagnosed it is too late for the patient. My brother has just died after being mis-diagnosed; when he was finally correctly diagnosed he had less than 6 months to live. The profile and funding of this cancer MUST be raised to be on a level with Breast Cancer and Prostate Cancer
